org.jgrapes.core

Class NamedEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event
        • org.jgrapes.core.NamedEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matchable

    public final class NamedEvent
extends Event
    A class for events identified by name. Instances of this class represent events that use their name for matching events with handlers.
    Author:
    mnl
